data.title: Full list of Nintendo Switch Online games in 2024
data.meta_description: The full list of Nintendo Switch Online games you can play in 2024, including N64, GBA, SNES, and NES retro games.
data.text:
The Nintendo Switch offers players access to its vast library of retro games through its Nintendo Switch Online subscription service.

If you're wondering what you can play in 2024 with a Nintendo Switch Online membership, we have you covered. In this article, we list every single game available on the service.

We've also rounded up some Nintendo Switch Online membership deals here.

The standard tier gives you access to NES, SNES, and Game Boy games. The Expansion Pack tier includes N64, GBA, and Mega Drive games.

You may be interested in our coverage of the best Nintendo Switch deals and the best Nintendo Switch games, or maybe you're not sure which Nintendo Switch you should buy.

Below are all the games currently on Nintendo Switch Online.

The article was last updated on August 9 to include Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team for GBA.

All other Nintendo Switch Online games

Nintendo Switch Online comes with access to a number of "99" games and expansions.

"99" games are available to all Nintendo Switch Online members:

F-Zero 99

Tetris 99

Expansions are only available to Nintendo Switch Online members with an Expansion Pack membership:
